pages.text: Are you going to become a pastry chef after all, in addition to your main job as an artist? These don't even look that bad (taste good too!).$(br2)Composed of $(l:cuisine/amaranth)Amaranth$(/l), $(item)Sugar$(), $(item)Milk$(), and a $(l:resources/clover)Four-Leafed Clover$(), it has a very special effect: you noticed that you were a little bit more successful handling tools with Fortune, Looting and other random-based things.
